src:
Hasil Liga 1: PSM Makassar Menang, Bali United Seri
06 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Dua hasil berbeda diraih tim-tim Liga 1 Indonesia di pertandingan pekan ke-27, Rabu, 6 November 2019. PSM Makassar yang menjamu Kalteng Putra berhasil meraih kemenangan. Sementara Bali United yang datang ke markas PSS Sleman hanya menuai hasil imbang.
PSM Makassar menang 2-1 atas Kalteng Putra. Dua gol tuan rumah dicetak oleh Amido Balde (menit ke-45) dan Rizky Pellu (66). Sedangkan gol dari tim tamu dicetak oleh Ahmad Lestaluhu (17).
Sepanjang pertandingan PSM menguasai jalannya permainan. Juara Piala Indonesia ini memegang 55 persen penguasaan bola. Kesempatan mencetak gol pun lebih banyak dimilik PSM, yakni sebanyak 16 kali sedangkan Kalteng hanya lima kali.
Kalteng harus kehilangan satu pemain pada menit ke-82. Abanda Rahman menerima kartu kuning kedua dari wasit yang berujung kepada kartu merah. Situasi itu membuat tim promosi dari Liga 2 Indonesia ini sulit mengembangkan permainan.
Sementara laga PSS Sleman kontra Bali United harus berakhir dengan imbang tanpa gol. Kedua tim selama 90 menit tampil saling menekan. PSS Sleman cukup unggul dalam penguasaan bola, yakni 53 persen tapi sayang kesulitan dalam mencetak gol. Begitu juga dengan Bali United.
Bagi PSM tambahan tiga angka berdampak ke peringkat di klasemen Liga 1 Indonesia. PSM untuk sementara berada di posisi ke-8 dengan 36 poin. Sedangkan Kalteng Putra ada di posisi ke-17 dengan 23 poin.
Sementara PSS Sleman yang berbagi angka menempati peringkat lima mengemas 40 poin. Bali United kokoh di puncak klasemen dengan 56 poin.

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1 Results: PSM Makassar Wins, Bali United Series
06 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Two different results were achieved by Indonesian League 1 teams in the 27th week of matches, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. PSM Makassar, which hosted Kalteng Putra, won. While Bali United who came to Sleman PSS headquarters only reaped a draw.
PSM Makassar won 2-1 over Kalteng Putra. Two goals scored by Amido Balde (45th minute) and Rizky Pellu (66). While goals from the visitors were scored by Ahmad Lestaluhu (17).
During the match PSM controlled the game. Indonesian Cup Champion holds 55 percent possession of the ball. PSM has more chances to score goals, which is 16 times while Central Kalimantan is only five times.
Central Kalimantan must lose one player in the 82nd minute. Abanda Rahman received a second yellow card from the referee which led to a red card. The situation made it difficult for the promotion team from Liga 2 Indonesia to develop the game.
While the PSS Sleman match against Bali United must end in a goalless draw. Both teams for 90 minutes appeared to press each other. PSS Sleman is quite superior in ball possession, which is 53 percent but unfortunately it is difficult to score. Likewise with Bali United.
For PSM, an additional three points have an impact on the ranking in the Indonesian League 1 league. PSM is temporarily in 8th place with 36 points. Whereas Kalteng Putra is in 17th place with 23 points.
While Sleman PSS who shared the number five ranked 40 points. Bali United is firmly on top of the standings with 56 points.

INDONESIA LIGA
